title: Gyanvapi Mosque Row Live Updates: SC asks Varanasi DM to ensure ‘shivling’ area protected without impeding Muslims’ access - The Indian Express
content:
1. Gyanvapi Mosque Row Live Updates: SC asks Varanasi DM to ensure ‘shivling’ area protected without impeding Muslims’ access  The Indian Express
  2. Video Of 'Shivling' In Gyanvapi Mosque Accessed, Will These Photos Settle This Matter? | EXCLUSIVE  India Today
  3. Gyanvapi Mosque: Officer Who Led Video Survey Sacked, Report By Thursday  NDTV
  4. A local court to hear plea for survey of Mathura mosque ‘on the lines of Gyanvapi’  The Indian Express
  5. On Gyanvapi Mosque, we are debating the wrong question  The Indian Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Gyanvapi Masjid Survey Live, Gyanvapi Masjid Case News Live Updates: The Varanasi court removed advocate-Commissioner Ajay Kumar Mishra, who was responsible for the filming and carrying out the survey of the Kashi Vishwanath temple-Gyanvapi mosque complex, from his post.
